description: The scholarship is for UCO students pursing a Forensic Science degree. Eligibility Requirements Student must be declared a Forensic Science major and currently enrolled at UCO the semester the application is completed. Student must be classified as an Oklahoma resident through the UCO Admissions Office. Student must be enrolled as a sophomore, junior, senior, or 2nd year graduate student at UCO for the school year that the scholarship is applied to their account (following school year). Student must provide a UCO transcript with any/all transfer coursework included or transcripts from all transfer institutions. Student must be enrolled full-time (12 hours for undergraduate students, 9 hours for graduate students) each semester the scholarship is received. This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
